definition: to have tender affection for/to love tenderly/to pamper sb
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.chinese: 保姆憐愛地撫摸着孩子。

sentences.english: You should develop self-love and ability to implant hope into hearts of people.
sentences.chinese: 你應該發展自我憐愛，種植的能力希望進人的心。

sentences.english: 'Tis a thousand pities your husband can't see 'ee now - you do look a real beauty! '
sentences.chinese: 要是你的丈夫現在看見你，一定要萬分憐愛你了？

sentences.english: And the naked man, gazing lovingly upon the king, entered into the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 他注視着國王，目光充滿憐愛，之後便走回銀鏡裏。

sentences.english: In general this cake is pink, warm and adorable.
sentences.chinese: 這個蛋糕總體上看很粉嫩，很溫馨，惹人憐愛。

sentences.english: The nurse fondled the child fondly .
sentences.chinese: 保姆憐愛地撫摸着孩子。

sentences.english: Jou-chia loved hearing her reminisce , so Jou-chia became the sole recipient of her affection.
sentences.chinese: 柔嘉最喜歡聽她的回憶，所以獨蒙憐愛。

sentences.english: He executes justice for the fatherless and the widow, and loves the sojourner, giving him food and clothing.
sentences.chinese: 他爲孤兒寡婦伸冤，又憐愛寄居的，賜給他衣食。

sentences.english: As well as respect they must have and show compassion to others as well.
sentences.chinese: 學會尊重他人的同時，也要懂得憐愛他人。

sentences.english: Young children, is innocent angel, kind-hearted people love.
sentences.chinese: 年幼的孩子，是單純無知的天使，善良得讓人憐愛。

definition: lit. cannot rest or eat in peace (idiom)/fig. extremely worried and troubled
to belittle/to scorn/to take sth lightly
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
to amuse oneself/to clown around/to provoke laughter
righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice
to wish for the whole world to be in chaos (idiom)
pinyin: wei2 kong3 tian1 xia4 bu4 luan4

definition: ashamed and unable to show one's face
lit. to hate iron for not becoming steel/to feel resentful towards sb for failing to meet expectations and impatient to see improvement (idiom)
